query.name: equipment_get_all
query.sql:
SELECT DISTINCT uplink_equipment.*, uplink_equipment_type.name, uplink_equipment_type.equipment_type_id, (&ifp_locations;.name) as location_address_name, &ifp_locations;.location_id
FROM (uplink_equipment, uplink_equipment_type, &ifp_locations;)
LEFT JOIN uplink_location_equipment ON (&ifp_locations;.location_id=uplink_location_equipment.location_address_id)
WHERE uplink_equipment.equipment_type_id=uplink_equipment_type.equipment_type_id AND uplink_location_equipment.equipment_id=uplink_equipment.equipment_id ORDER BY &ifp_locations;.name, uplink_equipment_type.name
